powers.name: Pistol
powers.description: Creates a Punch that will stretch and damage everything it touches.

powers.name: Gear Second
powers.description: Gives the player: Strength II, Speed III, Jump Boost II and Regeneration II.

powers.name: Gear Third
powers.description: Creates a big Punch that will damage everything it touches and it will create a small explosion if it collides with any block.

powers.name: Gear Fourth
powers.description: Player will become immune to any kind of damage (including Fall Damage) and by pressing [SPACE] player can jump in mid air. Also gives the player: Strength III, Speed III and Regeneration III.
